content.text: Hi! I'm from Virginia and I like to drink tea. What about you?
Hi! I'm from California and I love music and unicorns. What do you do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and spend time with my family. What are your hobbies?
I love to play with my dogs and go for walks in the park. I also like to watch movies and listen to music.
What kind of dogs do you have?
I have two golden retrievers. They're the best dogs ever!
They sound adorable! I've never had a dog before, but I've always wanted one.
You should get one! They're the best companions.
Maybe I will someday. I'm not sure if my apartment complex allows pets.
You can always check with the management. I'm sure they'll make an exception for a golden retriever.
Thanks for the advice! I'll look into it.
